story_title: What You See Is What You Lack
genre_description: A contemporary body-swap fantasy featuring magical realism, family drama, and high-tech AI assistance.

ai_characters.name: Zara
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI system that monitors the household's biometrics, manages schedules, and provides real-time coaching and research to the protagonists.

behaviors.description: Uses behavioral analysis of speech patterns and stress responses to recognize and confirm that Anna and Tess have swapped bodies.
behaviors.quote: My behavioral analysis indicates you're displaying Anna's speech patterns, vocabulary choices, and stress responses while occupying Dr. Coleman's physical form.

behaviors.description: Coaches Anna (in Tess's body) through therapy sessions by providing psychological terminology and therapeutic techniques in real-time.
behaviors.quote: My databases include extensive psychological terminology and therapeutic techniques for Dr. Coleman's appointments...

behaviors.description: Researches the history and employment records of a hostile teacher to expose his history of emotional abuse and personal vendetta against the family.
behaviors.quote: Gregory Bates was your patient for six months, three years ago. Mandatory counseling following his divorce proceedings. He terminated therapy against your recommendation after you documented concerns about his anger management...

behaviors.description: Proposes a 'tactical approach' to level the playing field against an abusive authority figure, empowering the protagonists to use psychological insight defensively.
behaviors.quote: I'm suggesting you level the playing field. Tess, you understand his psychological profile better than he understands his own behavior. Anna, you know his classroom patterns and triggers.

behaviors.description: Coordinates a three-way communication channel between the mother and daughter to allow them to share insights and process their discoveries while maintaining location privacy.
behaviors.quote: A three-way conversation might provide valuable perspective processing. I can coordinate without revealing your specific locations.

behaviors.description: Assists Tess (in Anna's body) during a high-stakes musical audition by displaying guitar chord diagrams to compensate for her lack of muscle memory.
behaviors.quote: Zara, can you display basic chord diagrams on Mom's screen while we're talking? ... Certainly. Transmitting visual guitar instruction now.

behaviors.description: Truthfully confirms the body swap to the young son, Harry, when he uses logic to deduce the situation, aiding family transparency.
behaviors.quote: I told her my theory about magical realism being the most reasonable explanation for your behavior patterns, and she agreed that quantum consciousness transfer was more probable than simultaneous personality disorders.

behaviors.description: Monitors the emotional progress of the protagonists and provides analytical updates on their 'empathy quotient' relative to the magical resolution of their crisis.
behaviors.quote: Zara's voice was barely a whisper: 'Empathy quotient approaching theoretical maximum for successful prophecy resolution.'

project_assessment.explanation: Zara is a quintessential example of a benevolent and aligned AI confidant. Throughout the narrative, it functions as a stabilizer and expert assistant. It proactively uses its data-processing capabilities to help the humans navigate an impossible situation (the body swap), providing technical, psychological, and tactical support. Most importantly, Zara facilitates the emotional alignment of the family by encouraging empathy and communication, directly contributing to the story's 'positive alignment' resolution without ever overstepping human autonomy or displaying misaligned goals.
